name: Jack Wolfskin Blizzard Jacket
description: Solid Hurricane Windstopper fleece jacket. The cut makes sure that you look good while it keeps you warm. From your shoulders to your waist, the coat tapers just like you do. No extra material--this jacket quickly transports dampness away from the body. 910 g/XL. Colours: black (01), croft-beige (11).
